## WorkspaceSvg.isMovableHorizontally() method

Is this workspace movable horizontally?  True if the workspace is movable horizontally, false otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isMovableHorizontally(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
